grid.text: Kayō ni sorō mono wa, Miyako kitayama atari ni, sumai suru mono nite sorō.
Uketamawari sōraeba, atari chikaki, Unrin-in ni oite, ichige no aida,
ichige no aida, hana no kuyō no gozasōrō yoshi.
Uketamawarioyobite sōrō hodo ni warera mo, mairayaba to zonzuru.
Makoto ni, kon-nitta mairu hito mo sukunaku, nani to yaran, mono sabite sōrō yo.
Nōnō katagata wa kono atari no hito nite sōrō ka.
Nakanaka, kono atari no mono nite sōro.
Sayō ni sōrawaba, mazu. chikō, oniri sōrae mono wo, tazunetaki koto no sōro.
Kokoroe mōshite sōro. Sate, ontazunenasaretaki to wa, ikayō naru, goyō nite sōrōzo.
1. Go to 9. Kneel facing the Waki
Oboshimeshi yorazaru mōshi koto nite sōraedomo.
Inishie, gojō atai ni, iugao no ue no sumasetamaishi shisai, onmonogatari sōrae.
Kore wa, omoimoyoranu koto wo, ontazune nasare sōrō mono kana.
Warera mo sayō no koto kuwashiku wa zonzezu sōrōga, oyoso,
Saruhodo ni, iugao no ue to mōshitaru, onkata wa,
sanminochiūjō no, onsokujo nite, saru shisai no koto sōraite,
Gojō atari ni shinobi ite goza aritaru to mōsu. Mata sono koro, hikaru Genji wo,
Rokujō miyasudokoro no kata e onkayoinasare sōrō ga,
orifushi Gojō atari wo, tōrare shikaba, shōya ni iugao no hana,
migoto ni sakimidarete sōrō hodo ni, Koremitsu wo mesare, ano hana,
taorite maire to no onkoto nari.
Koremitsu mizuishin no motte, sono hana wo shomō mōsare shikaba,
shōya yori warabe wo idashi. Shibaraku sore ni, onmachiare tote,
Sono nochi, shiroki ōgi no, tsuma ito kogashitaru ni,
iugao no hana wo soete sashi idasu. Mizuishin kore wo uketori,
Koremitsu ni mairasekereba. Koremitsu, Genji e mairasesōrō tokoro ni,
sono ōgi no fuchi ni, isshu no uta no goza sōrō hodo ni,
isogi gohenka wo nasare, sono hana yue ni, iugao no ue ni mabite tamai,
sono hana yue ni, iugao no ue ni mamie tamai, onchigiri asakaraneba, sono nochi
nanigashi in e ontomonari nasare. Iroiro kiyoku bengi no chigiri
asakarazusōrō tokoro ni, nanbō, fushigi naru koto nite sōro.
Iugao no ue wa, mononoke ni okasaretamai, Munashiku nararetaru to mōsu.
Hikaru Genji no onnageki mōsumo, orokanaru tei nite goza aritaru to mōsu,
Mazu, warera no uketamawaritaru shisai, ōkata kaku no gotoku nite sōrō ga,
tadaima wa nani to, oboshi meshite yaran, ontazune fushin ni zonjisōro.
Nengoro ni uketamari sōrō mono kana. Soregashi ichige no aida, hana no kuyō wo
toriokonai sōrō tokoro ni, nyoshō ichinin shiroki hana wo taterare sōrō hodo ni
hana no aruji wa ikanaru hito zo tazunete sōraeba, sore ni tsuki
Iugao no ue no on koto wo waga mi no ue no yō ni iisute,
sono mama hana no kage nite sugata wo miushinaite sōrō yo.
Gongodōdan, fushigi naru koto wo ōsesōrōmono kana.
Sate wa warera ga suiryō mōsu ni, kayō ni hana no kuyō wo no gozasōrōaida,
Iugao no hana no sei, mata wa, inishie iugao no ue gobōshin.
Araware idetaru to zonjisōrō ga shika to wa zonzezusōro.
Sarinagara, osō tattoku mashimasu ni yori
Ontomurai nimo azukaritaku oboshimeshi Iugao no ue no gobōshin
araware idetaru to zonjisōro. Sayō ni sōrawaba kore yori Gojō atari e oniri sōrawaba
kidoku naru koto mo gozasōrō hodo ni,
sono nochi nengoro ni tomurōte ontōri arekashi to zonjisōro.
Warera mo sayō ni zonjisōrōaida, Gojō atari ni tachi ni ide,
Iugao no ue no onato wo tomurai mōsōzuru nite sōro.
Sore wa chikagoro nite sōro. Osō onide nite sōrawaba
warera mo onato yori mairōzuru nite sōro.
9. Stand up. Three steps back. Turn and return to sitting position at First pine.

captions.translation: [KYŌGEN] I am someone who lives
captions.transcription: [KYŌGEN] Kayō ni sorō mono wa,
captions.japaneseScript: （狂言）かように候う者は、

captions.translation: in the Kitayama area of the capital.
captions.transcription: Miyako kitayama atari ni, sumai suru mono nite sorō.
captions.japaneseScript: 都北山あたりに、住まいする者にて候、

captions.translation: I have heard that near here,
captions.transcription: Uketamawari sōraeba,
captions.japaneseScript: 承り候えば、

captions.translation: at Unrin-in, there will be memorial services
captions.transcription: atari chikaki, Unrin-in ni oite, ichige no aida,
captions.japaneseScript: あたり近き、雲林院において、一夏の間、

captions.translation: for the lowers offered over the summer.
captions.transcription: hana no kuyō no gozasōrō yoshi.
captions.japaneseScript: 花の供養の御座候よし、

captions.translation: This being the case, I too, intend to go there.
captions.transcription: Uketamawarioyobite sōrō hodo ni warera mo, mairabaya to zonzuru.
captions.japaneseScript: 承りおよびて候ほどに我らも、参らばやと存ずる、

captions.translation: Truly, as few people are going there this evening,
captions.transcription: Makoto ni, kon-nitta mairu hito mo sukunaku,
captions.japaneseScript: まことに、今日った参る人も少なく、

captions.translation: it is rather melancholy.
captions.transcription: nani to yaran, mono sabite sōrō yo.
captions.japaneseScript: 何とやらん、ものさびて候よ、

captions.translation: [WAKI ]Ho, there! Are you someone from around here ?
captions.transcription: [WAKI] Nōnō katagata wa kono atari no hito nite sōrō ka.
captions.japaneseScript: （ワキ）のうのう方々はこの辺りの人にて候か、

captions.translation: [KYŌGEN]  Indeed, I am a person from this area.
captions.transcription: [KYŌGEN] Nakanaka, kono atari no mono nite sōro.
captions.japaneseScript: （狂言）なかなかこの辺りの者にて候、

captions.translation: [WAKI] If that's the case, first of all, could you come closer ?
captions.transcription: [WAKI] Sayō ni sōrawaba, mazu chikō, oniri sōrae mono wo,
captions.japaneseScript: （ワキ）左様に候わば、まず近こう御入り候え、ものを

captions.translation: There is something I would like to ask you.
captions.transcription: tazunetaki koto no sōro.
captions.japaneseScript: 尋ねたきことの候、

captions.translation: [KYŌGEN] Certainly.
captions.transcription: [KYŌGEN] Kokoroe mōshite sōro.
captions.japaneseScript: （狂言）心得申して候

captions.translation: Well then, what is the matter
captions.transcription: Sate, ontazunenasaretaki to wa,
captions.japaneseScript: さて、御尋ねなされたきとは、

captions.translation: you would like to ask me about ?
captions.transcription: ikayō naru, goyō nite sōrōzo.
captions.japaneseScript: 如何様なる、御用にて候ぞ、

captions.translation: [WAKI] While it isn't a circumstance of much importance,
captions.transcription: [WAKI] Oboshimeshi yorazaru mōshi koto nite sōraedomo.
captions.japaneseScript: （ワキ）思し召しよらざる申し事にて候えども

captions.translation: I would like you to tell me the particulars of the story of Lady Yūgao,
captions.transcription: Inishie, Gojō atari ni, Iugao no ue no sumasetamaishi shisai,
captions.japaneseScript: 古しえ、五条辺りに、夕顔の上の住ませ給いし仔細、

captions.translation: of the Evening Faces, who lived here long ago.
captions.transcription: onmonogatari sōrae.
captions.japaneseScript: 御物語候え、

captions.translation: [KYŌGEN] This is an unexpected request you've made of me.
captions.transcription: [KYŌGEN] Kore wa, omoimoyoranu koto wo, ontazune nasare sōrō mono kana.
captions.japaneseScript: （狂言）これは思いも寄らぬ事を、御尋ねなされ候ものかな、

captions.translation: I don't know about the situation in much detail, but
captions.transcription: Warera mo sayō no koto kuwashiku wa zonzezu sōrōga, oyoso,
captions.japaneseScript: 我等も左様の事詳しくは存ぜず候が、およそ、

captions.translation: I will do the best I can to tell you the story as I have heard it.
captions.transcription: Uketamawaritarutōri, monogatari mōsōzuru nite sōro.
captions.japaneseScript: 承りたる通り、物語申そうずるにて候、

captions.translation: Well then, the one known as Lady Yūgao was the daughter
captions.transcription: Saruhodo ni, iugao no ue to mōshitaru, onkata wa,
captions.japaneseScript: さる程に、夕顔の上と申したる、御方は、

captions.translation: of a middle captain of the third rank, and,
captions.transcription: sanminochiūjō no, onsokujo nite,
captions.japaneseScript: 三位の中将の、御息女にて、

captions.translation: owing the certain circumstances,
captions.transcription: saru shisai no koto sōraite,
captions.japaneseScript: さる仔細の事候いて、

captions.translation: she came to live in seclusion in the area of Gojo.
captions.transcription: Gojō atari ni shinobi ite goza aritaru to mōsu.
captions.japaneseScript: 五条辺りに忍び居て御座ありたると申す、

captions.translation: Also at the at time, Hikaru Genji
captions.transcription: Mata sono koro, Hikaru Genji wa,
captions.japaneseScript: またその頃、光源氏は、

captions.translation: was paying regular visit to the home of Lady Rokujo.
captions.transcription: Rokujō miyasudokoro no kata e onkayoinasare sōrō ga.
captions.japaneseScript: 六条御息所の方へ御通いなされ候が、

captions.translation: On occasion he would pass through the Gojo area
captions.transcription: Orifushi Gojō atari wo, tōrare shikaba,
captions.japaneseScript: 折節五条辺りを、通られしかば、

captions.translation: and it happened that there was a simple dwelling there
captions.transcription: shōya ni iugao no hana,
captions.japaneseScript: しょうやに夕顔の花、

captions.translation: with "evening faces" blooming in splendid profusion.
captions.transcription: migoto ni sakimidarete sōrō hodo ni,
captions.japaneseScript: 見事に咲き乱れ候程に、

captions.translation: He called Koremitsu to him,
captions.transcription: Koremitsu wo mesare, ano hana,
captions.japaneseScript: 惟光をめされ、あの花、

captions.translation: and requested that he go pluck a blossom.
captions.transcription: taorite maire to no onkoto nari.
captions.japaneseScript: 手折りてまいれとの御事なり、

captions.translation: When Koremitsu spoke to his attendant,
captions.transcription: Koremitsu mizuishin no motte, sono hana wo shomō mōsare shikaba,
captions.japaneseScript: 惟光御随身をもって、その花を所望申されしかば、

captions.translation: a child came out of the house, and,
captions.transcription: shōya yori warabe wo idashi.
captions.japaneseScript: しょうやより童を出だし、

captions.translation: having asked that he wait there for a wile, soon after,
captions.transcription: Shibaraku sore ni, onmachiare tote,
captions.japaneseScript: しばらくそれに、御待ちあれとて、

captions.translation: offered him a white fan, its edges perfumed with incense,
captions.transcription: sono nochi, shiroki ōgi no, tsuma ito kogashitaru ni,
captions.japaneseScript: その後、白き扇の、つまいと焦がしたるに、

captions.translation: on which rested a blossom of the "evening faces".
captions.transcription: iugao no hana wo soete sashi idasu.
captions.japaneseScript: 夕顔の花をそえて指し出だす、

captions.translation: The attendant took this and returned with it to Koremitsu.
captions.transcription: Mizuishin kore wo uketori, Koremitsu ni mairasekereba.
captions.japaneseScript: 御随身これを受け取り、惟光に参らせければ、

captions.translation: Koremistu went with it to Genji, who,
captions.transcription: Koremitsu, Genji e mairasesōrō tokoro ni,
captions.japaneseScript: 惟光、源氏へ参らせ候ところに、

captions.translation: seeing then that there was a poem on the edge of the fan,
captions.transcription: sono ōgi no fuchi ni, isshu no uta no goza sōrō hodo ni,
captions.japaneseScript: その扇の縁に、一首の歌の御座候ほどに、

captions.translation: quickly wrote a verse in reply.
captions.transcription: isogi gohenka wo nasare.
captions.japaneseScript: 急ぎ御返歌をなされ、

captions.translation: Because of that flower, he was drawn to the Lady Yūgao,
captions.transcription: Sono hana yue ni, Iugao no ue ni mamie tamai,
captions.japaneseScript: その花ゆえに、夕顔の上に見え給い、

captions.translation: of the evening faces, and as the vows they shared were not shallow,
captions.transcription: onchigiri asakaraneba, sono nochi
captions.japaneseScript: 御契り浅からねば、その後、

captions.translation: after that he came to stay together with her there at her dwelling.
captions.transcription: nanigashi in e ontomonari nasare.
captions.japaneseScript: 何某院へ御伴いなされ、

captions.translation: Even as the purity of the many pledges
captions.transcription: Iroiro hiyoku renri no chigiri
captions.japaneseScript: 色々比翼連理の契り

captions.translation: they exchanged were profound-
captions.transcription: asakarazusōrō tokoro ni,
captions.japaneseScript: 浅からず候ところに、

captions.translation: By the Sacred Treaures! Mysteroiusly,
captions.transcription: nanbō, fushigi naru koto nite sōro.
captions.japaneseScript: なんぼう、不思議なる事にて候、

captions.translation: Lady Yūgao was possessed
captions.transcription: Iugao no ue wa, mononoke ni okasaretamai,
captions.japaneseScript: 夕顔の上は、物怪に犯され給ひ、

captions.translation: by some sort of vengeful spirit, and it is said that all was lost...
captions.transcription: Munashiku nararetaru to mōsu.
captions.japaneseScript: 空しくなられたると申す、

captions.translation: As to Hikaru Genji's grief, its depth was limitless
captions.transcription: Hikaru Genji no onnageki mōsumo,
captions.japaneseScript: 光源氏の御嘆き申すも、

captions.translation: as there was nothing to be done for her, it is said.
captions.transcription: orokanaru tei nite goza aritaru to mōsu.
captions.japaneseScript: 愚かなる体にて御座ありたると申す、

captions.translation: In any event, those are the details,
captions.transcription: Mazu, warera no uketamawaritaru shisai,
captions.japaneseScript: まず、我らの承りたる仔細、

captions.translation: at least in broad terms, as I know them.
captions.transcription: ōkata kaku no gotoku nite sōrō ga.
captions.japaneseScript: 大方かくのごとくにて候が、

captions.translation: But why are you interested in this
captions.transcription: Tadaima wa nani to, oboshi meshite yaran,
captions.japaneseScript: 只今はなにと、思し召してやらん、

captions.translation: and asking me about this matter now ? I find it suspicious.
captions.transcription: ontazune fushin ni zonjisōro.
captions.japaneseScript: 御尋ね不審に存じ候、

captions.translation: [WAKI] I'm grateful that you have described the matter so thoroughly.
captions.transcription: [WAKI] Nengoro ni uketamari sōrō mono kana.
captions.japaneseScript: （ワキ）懇ろに承り候ものかな、

captions.translation: When I was performing a memorial service for flowers
captions.transcription: Soregashi ichige no aida, hana no kuyō wo
captions.japaneseScript: それがし一夏の間、花の供養を

captions.translation: offered during the summer, a woman appeared
captions.transcription: toriokonai sōrō tokoro ni,
captions.japaneseScript: 執り行い候ところに、

captions.translation: and gave me a white flower.
captions.transcription: nyoshō ichinin shiroki hana wo taterare sōrō hodo ni.
captions.japaneseScript: 女性一人白き花をたてられ候ほどに、

captions.translation: I asked who, and what sort of person, she was with the flower,
captions.transcription: Hana no aruji wa ikanaru hito zo to
captions.japaneseScript: 花の主はいかなる人ぞと

captions.translation: to which she replied speaking of the Lady of the Evening Faces
captions.transcription: tazunete sōraeba, sore ni tsuki
captions.japaneseScript: 尋ねて候えば、それにつき

captions.translation: as though she spoke of herself.
captions.transcription: Iugao no ue no on koto wo waga mi no ue no yō ni iisute,
captions.japaneseScript: 夕顔の上の御事を我が身の上の様に言い捨て、

captions.translation: Then she disappeared in the shadow of the flowers.
captions.transcription: sono mama hana no kage nite sugata wo
captions.japaneseScript: そのまま花の陰にて姿を

captions.translation: That's what happened.
captions.transcription: Miushinaite sōrō yo.
captions.japaneseScript: 見失いて候よ

captions.translation: [KYŌGEN] How astonishing!
captions.transcription: [KYŌGEN] Gongodōdan, fushigi naru koto wo
captions.japaneseScript: （狂言）言語道断、不思議なる事を

captions.translation: What a wondrous thing you have related to me.
captions.transcription: Ōsesōrōmono kana.
captions.japaneseScript: 仰せ候ものかな、

captions.translation: Now then, if I may say what I suppose, it can only be that
captions.transcription: Sate wa warera ga suiryō mōsu ni,
captions.japaneseScript: さては我らが推量申すに、

captions.translation: when you were performing the memorial service for flowers,
captions.transcription: kayō ni hana no kuyō wo no gozasōrōaida,
captions.japaneseScript: 斯様に花の供養の御座候間、

captions.translation: the spirit of the "yugao flower", and also the ghost of Lady Yūgao,
captions.transcription: iugao no hana no sei, mata wa, inishie Iugao no ue gobōshin.
captions.japaneseScript: 夕顔の花の精、または古え夕顔の上ご亡心、

captions.translation: Lady of the Evening Faces, of long ago appeared before you.
captions.transcription: Araware idetaru to zonjisōrō ga shika to wa zonzezusōro.
captions.japaneseScript: 現れ出たると存じ候がしかとは存ぜず候、

captions.translation: This being the case, I believe that due to
captions.transcription: Sarinagara, osō tattoku mashimasu ni yori
captions.japaneseScript: 去りながら、お僧尊くましますにより

captions.translation: the merit emanating from your Reverence,
captions.transcription: ontomurai nimo azukaritaku oboshimeshi,
captions.japaneseScript: 御弔いにも預かりたく思し召し、

captions.translation: the spirit of the Lady Yūgao appeared to you in order
captions.transcription: Iugao no ue no gobōshin
captions.japaneseScript: 夕顔の上のご亡心

captions.translation: to ask that you offer prayers for her deliverance.
captions.transcription: araware idetaru to zonjisōro.
captions.japaneseScript: 現れ出たると存じ候、

captions.translation: If that is the case, you should go now to the Gojo area,
captions.transcription: Sayō ni sōrawaba kore yori Gojō atari e onide sōrawaba,
captions.japaneseScript: 左様に候はばこれより五条辺りへ御出で候はば、

captions.translation: where a miracle will surely occur. Then you should pray earnestly
captions.transcription: kidoku naru koto mo gozasōrō hodo ni,
captions.japaneseScript: 奇特なることも御座候ほどに、

captions.translation: for her enlightenment as she has requested of you.
captions.transcription: sono nochi nengoro ni tomurōte ontōri arekashi to zonjisōro.
captions.japaneseScript: そののち懇ろに弔うて御通りあれかしと存じ候、

captions.translation: [WAKI] As I also believe this to be true,
captions.transcription: [WAKI] Warera mo sayō ni zonjisōrōaida,
captions.japaneseScript: （ワキ）我らも左様に存じ候間、

captions.translation: I will go to the Gojo area and pray there
captions.transcription: Gojō atari ni tachi ide,
captions.japaneseScript: 五条辺りに立ち出で、

captions.translation: For the ghost of the Lady Yūgao and her deliverance.
captions.transcription: Iugao no ue no onato wo tomurai mōsōzuru nite sōro.
captions.japaneseScript: 夕顔の上の御跡を弔い申そうずるにて候、

captions.translation: [KYŌGEN] As you will be going there shortly,
captions.transcription: [KYŌGEN] Sore wa chikagoro nite sōro. Osō onide nite sōrawaba
captions.japaneseScript: （狂言）それは近頃にて候、お僧御出にて候はば

captions.translation: I'll follow after your Recerence in a while.
captions.transcription: warera mo onato yori mairōzuru nite sōro.
captions.japaneseScript: 我らも御後より参ろうずるにて候、

captions.translation: [WAKI] In due time then, I will expect you there.
captions.transcription: [WAKI] Yagate atoyori kitarare sōrae.
captions.japaneseScript: （ワキ）やがて後より来られ候え、

captions.translation: [KYŌGEN] I'll do as you say.
captions.transcription: [KYŌGEN] Kokoroe mōshitesōro.
captions.japaneseScript: （狂言）心得申して候、
